Text:
The patch file for this program definitely shows to have a trojan as assessed by over a dozen different online multi-scanners, such as jotti's:

http://virusscan.jotti.org/en/scanresult/f12fdde358e6ed7a6fb4a045497412aad90276d9/dbda68569fe4891d0fb4762716760f2b42b8fe79

and virscan.org:

http://r.virscan.org/687a007bb6c9333c49b3a537e00e841c


however this alternate torrent of a slightly older version scans clean:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6863842/Nitro.PDF.Professional.v7.0.1.5.Cracked-CzW
